name: lifebox.
description: lifebox is a storage service where you can save your photos, videos, music and files. You can reach these files by phone, tablet or PC at any point where you have access to the internet. Easily share these files once connected to the internet. All subscribers who download the app and log in will receive a 5 GB storage space as a gift. You can purchase a package to increase storage space. Purchased packages are automatically renewed each month. This application was written using frameworks AngularJS. My responsibilities on the project included supporting and improving the application, adding new feature. Backend interaction.

name: iKassa.
description: Modern software device to work in the full range of retail.
